description: Få all viktig information om ett uppdrag i uppdragsfönstret.
name: Uppdragshjälpen

normal.description: Visar sannolikheten för att ett fordon kommer att vara efterfrågat.
normal.title: Visa sannolikhet för efterfrågan.

expansions.description: Listar upp möjliga utvecklingar för uppdraget
expansions.title: Utveckling

followup.description: Listar möjliga uppföljningsanvändningar för denna applikation.
followup.title: Uppföljningsuppdrag

generatedBy.description: Visar från vilken byggnad uppdraget genererades från.
generatedBy.title: Skapad av (building type)

hide_battalion_chief_vehicles.description: Döljer brandbefäl och visar istället räddningsledning.
hide_battalion_chief_vehicles.title: Döljer brandbefäl

k9_only_if_needed.description: Indikerar om hundenhet endast begärs, om tillgängligt.
k9_only_if_needed.title: Valfri hundpatrull

battalion_chief_vehicles.description: Trekker fra antall påkrevde innsatsstøttebil fra innsatsleder brann og skjuler innsatsleder brann hvis tallet faller under 0.
battalion_chief_vehicles.title: Brandbefäl vs räddningsledning

heavy_rescue_vehicles.description: Trekker antall nødvendige brannbiler fra tungredningsbiler og skjuler brannbiler hvis tallet faller under 0. Denne funksjonen er ment for personer som kjører et rent redningsbil-system.
heavy_rescue_vehicles.title: Tungredningsbil vs räddningsbil

platform_trucks.description: Trekker antall brannbiler fra Snorkelbiler og skjuler brannbiler hvis tallet faller under 0.
platform_trucks.title: Snorkelbil vs Stegbil

noVehicleRequirements.description: Set here which special requirements to show, if they exist for that mission.
noVehicleRequirements.title: Special requirements

allow_arff_instead_of_lf.description: Indicates, if instead of a firetruck arrfs are possible on site.
allow_arff_instead_of_lf.title: Show if arrfs are allowed as firetrucks

allow_ktw_instead_of_rtw.description: Viser om en syketransport kan benyttes istedenfor en ambulanse.
allow_ktw_instead_of_rtw.title: Syketransport istedenfor ambulanse

allow_rw_instead_of_lf.description: Indicates, if instead of a firetruck also heavy rescue or rescue engine is possible on site.
allow_rw_instead_of_lf.title: Show Heavy Rescue / rescue engine instead of firetrucks

hideWhenNoNeed.description: Hides the patient details if there are no more patients and patients do not appear until the end of the assignment.
hideWhenNoNeed.title: Show patient details only when needed

live.description: Shows at the top of the mission helper how many patients the mission currently has.
live.title: Number of current patients

patient_allow_first_responder_chance.description: Shows with how much % any vehicle is sufficient to treat.
patient_allow_first_responder_chance.title: First Responder Probability

title.description: Shows the heading "Patients" above the details about possible patients.
title.title: Patients (Title)

place.description: Shows next to the title which POI is required for this mission.
place.title: POI

prerequisites.description: Shows the requirements (e.g. 3 rescue stations and 4 fire stations)
prerequisites.title: Prerequisites

live.description: Shows at the top of the mission helper how many prisoners the mission currently has.
live.title: Number of current prisoners

title.description: Shows the heading "Prisoners" above the details about possible prisoners.
title.title: Prisoners (Title)

title.description: Shows the mission name, e.g. "Trashcan fire" as title.
title.title: mission name

type.description: Shows the type number of the mission next to the title.
type.title: Type number

patient_additionals.description: If there are currently more than 10 patients on site, EMS-Chief is automatically listed at the beginning of the vehicle requirements.
patient_additionals.title: Mention EMS-Chief extra

sort.caption: Name of the requirement
sort.description: Define what the vehicle requirements should be sorted by.
sort.title: Sorting the vehicle requirements

title.description: Displays the heading "Vehicles" above the vehicle requirements.
title.title: Vehicles (Title)
